data.content:
Danh từ
sự an ủi
nguồn an ủi; niềm an ủi

noun
plural -tions
something that makes a person feel less sadness, disappointment, etc. [noncount]
His apology was of little/no consolation (to me). [=his apology did not make me feel much/any better]
She found/took great consolation [=comfort] in all the cards and letters she received.
If it's any consolation (to you) [=if it helps you to feel better], no one else got much of a raise this year, either. [count]
His kind words were a consolation to/for me.
[count] :a contest in which people or teams that have previously lost compete against each other - usually used before another noun
a consolation game/match/race
